Package com.elte.supplymanagersystem.controllers

Class OrderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elte.supplymanagersystem.controllers.OrderController
  • @CrossOrigin
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/orders")
public class OrderController
extends Object
    The Order Controller is responsible for: creating Endpoints and wiring User and Order Services

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        @GetMapping("")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAll​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns all the Orders from OrderService based on the Role of the logged in User. Calls getAll method from OrderService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with All the Orders in the Database.

      • get

        @GetMapping("/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity get​(@PathVariable
                                                   Long id,
                                                   org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns the Order with the given ID from OrderService based on the Role of the logged in User. Calls getById method from OrderService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Order to get.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity of the Order with the given ID.

      • getHistoriesByOrderId

        @GetMapping("/{id}/histories")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getHistoriesByOrderId​(@PathVariable
                                                                     Long id,
                                                                     org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns with the Histories of an order from OrderService based on the Role of the logged in User. Calls getHistoriesByOrderId method from OrderService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Order to get the Histories of.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with the history of the requested Order to which the user is authorized.

      • getMonthlyApproximatedIncome

        @GetMapping("/stats/monthlyIncome")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getMonthlyApproximatedIncome​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns an array with the monthly active and closed sales of the company.
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with 12 month of data.

        Returns an array with the monthly active and closed expenses of the company.
        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • getOrderCountStatistics

        @GetMapping("/stats/orderCount")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getOrderCountStatistics​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns an array with the amount of: active sales, closed sales, active purchases, closed purchases.
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with the 4 long array.

      • getUserCountByRole

        @GetMapping("/stats/userCount")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getUserCountByRole​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns an array with the amount of registered user by role.
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with a map containing the 3 role.

      • postHistoryForOrderById

        @PostMapping("/{id}/histories")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity postHistoryForOrderById​(@RequestBody
                                                                       HistoryDTO historyDTO,
                                                                       @PathVariable
                                                                       Long id,
                                                                       org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Creates a new record of History. Calls postHistoryForOrderById method from OrderService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        historyDTO - The History Data Transfer Object with the information to save.
        id - The ID of the Order, to which the user want to add history.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with the saved record.

      • getSales

        @GetMapping("/sales")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getSales​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns Company Orders where the Company is a Seller based on the Workplace of the User who logged in. Calls getSalesByUser method from OrderService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity of Orders.

      • getPurchases

        @GetMapping("/purchases")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getPurchases​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns Company Orders where the Company is a Seller based on the Workplace of the User who logged in. Calls getPurchasesByUser method from OrderService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity of Orders.

      • getMyOrders

        @GetMapping("/myorders")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getMyOrders​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns Company Orders where the User who logged in is a seller or buyer manager. Calls getOrdersOfUser method from OrderService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity of Orders.

      • put

        @PutMapping("/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity put​(@RequestBody
                                                   OrderDTO orderDTO,
                                                   @PathVariable
                                                   Long id,
                                                   org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Updates an Order by ID based on User Role. Calls putById method from OrderService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        orderDTO - The order Data Transfer Object with the updated information.
        id - The ID of the Order to update.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with the updated record.

      • post

        @PostMapping("")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity post​(@RequestBody
                                                    OrderDTO orderDTO,
                                                    org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Creates a new record of Order. Calls addOrder method from OrderService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        orderDTO - The order Data Transfer Object with the information to save.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with the saved record.

      • delete

        @DeleteMapping("/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity delete​(@PathVariable
                                                      Long id,
                                                      org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Deletes a record by ID. Calls deleteById method from OrderService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Order to delete.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity: OK if the deletion was successful and NotFound if the record was not found.
